DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 out of 3 cards and add it to your hand.
Reduces incoming damage by 10% per stack.
Become Elusive, reducing incoming damage by 10% per stack, but breaks if you play ANY non-Shadowstep card.
Stolen cards are mostly low energy cards that gain Exhaust when attained through stealing. NL After Stealing #b5 cards, add #b1 #rFleeting #rGuilt to your hand.
Triggers if this is the first card you play in a turn, or if it's played after a Shadowstep card.
